fields.englishLabel: Message displayed if answer is selected
fields.label: Melding som vises hvis alternativet er valgt
fields.englishDescription: Message will appear below the answer on "continue" if this answer is selected.
fields.description: Meldingen vises under alternativet når brukeren trykker "Fortsett"

fields.englishLabel: Message displayed if answer is not selected
fields.label: Melding som vises hvis alternativet ikke er valgt
fields.englishDescription: Message will appear below the answer on "continue" if this answer is not selected.
fields.description: Meldingen vises under alternativet når brukeren trykker "Fortsett"
